system.description: Daemons of Khorne gain a +10 bonus to their Weapon Skill when making a Charge action.
Daemons of Khorne suffer no penalties from gore and blood (such as when a Critical Effect covers an area in gore and would require an Agility test to avoid falling).
A Daemon of Tzeentch is perpetually surrounded by a cloud of shifting energy. All attacks against the Daemon suffer a -10 penalty to hit.
Daemons of Tzeentch gain a +10 bonus to all Focus Power tests. In addition, when a Daemon of Tzeentch Pushes a psychic power, it adds +3 to its psy rating instead of the usual amount.

All of Nurgle's Daemons are covered in weeping sores, pus-filled boils, and a variety of disgusting and terrible infections. All characters within 3 metres of a Daemon of Nurgle must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test at the start of each turn or gain 1 level of Fatigue. In addition, the effects of any poison, toxin, or disease used on a Daemon of Nurgle are halved.

Daemons of Nurgle are constantly surrounded by clouds of buzzing, biting flies that attack and harass their enemies. All characters within 2 metres of the Daemon suffer a -10 penalty to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests.

Daemons of Slaanesh emit an aura of desire and compulsion. All characters within 10 metres of the Daemon must make a Challenging (+0) Willpower test at the beginning of each of their turns. Those who fail cannot make attacks against the Daemon until the beginning of their next turn.
Daemons of Slaanesh are unnaturally agile and elegant in combat. They gain +10 to Dodge tests and +10 to Weapon Skill tests made to Feint.
